name: The Settlers 5 - History Edition
summary:
The Settlers 5 History Edition is a realtime strategy game for PC (Microsoft Windows). This fith installment in the settlers series focuses more on action and combat than on base building. Follow the story of Dario and his companions who embark on a quest to defeat the dark knights. 
This is a rerelease of the settlers v game with both the expansion disc and the legends addons combined. The expansion disc adds new units, heroes, buildungs and full campaing. The legends addon adds new missions to the game. This version comes with official windows 10 support and multiplayer over the uplay network.
